channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Workspace Promo Code: Up to 14% Off in 2026
item.description: Boost your productivity and save with exclusive Google Workspace coupons from WIRED. Get up to 14% off plans for three months, including Starter, Stan...

item.title: Discovering the Dimensions of a New Cold War
item.description: The United States’ plan for dealing with Putin’s Russia and Xi’s China remains ill-defined among a shifting global order. That must change.

item.title: Walmart Promo Codes and Coupons: Up to 65% Off
item.description: Score $10 off with our Walmart coupon and shop flash deals up to 65% off today.

item.title: AI-Powered Dating Is All Hype. IRL Cruising Is the Future
item.description: Dating apps and AI companies have been touting bot wingmen for months. But the future might just be good old-fashioned meet-cutes.

item.title: Fears Mount That US Federal Cybersecurity Is Stagnating—or Worse

item.title: The phone is dead. Long live . . . what exactly?
item.description: "We're not going to be using iPhones in 10 years," Callaghan says flatly. "I kind of don't think we'll be using them in five years."

item.title: 12 investors dish on what 2026 will bring for climate tech

item.title: The best AI-powered dictation apps of 2025
item.description: AI-powered dictation apps are useful for replying to emails, taking notes, and even coding through your voice

item.title: VCs predict enterprises will spend more on AI in 2026 — through fewer vendors
item.description: Enterprises have been experimenting with AI tools for a few years. Investors predict they will start to pick winners in 2026.
